snippet.title: Escape Academy Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam today: https://bit.ly/Escape-Academy-Steam

Welcome to the Escape Academy. Train to become the ultimate Escape Room master. Solve Puzzles. Hack Servers. Meet the Faculty. Brew the perfect cup of tea. Entirely playable in single player or co-op with a friend - local or online! Coming in 2022 to PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S, Steam, and Day One on Xbox Game Pass.
